pages.text: From the warred scrolls there's mention of a powerful variant, stronger than even the Redstone Golems, that was made and banished to a lost land. There's also mentioned of how some scholars recorded how this beast was made before they were destroyed, but surely there's some that still remains...
The scroll mentions that the beast's design may have came from a being of $(l)The End$(), perhaps that's where the secrets may lay.
